text: Currently there seems to be no way to change major and minor unit changes for ValueAxis (similar to HSSFCahrt.setValueRange(int axisIndex, java.lang.Double minimum, java.lang.Double maximum, java.lang.Double majorUnit, java.lang.Double minorUnit).
creator: srivastavavijay@gmail.com
apache@gagravarr.org
text: Any chance you could write up a small patch to add this in? Bonus marks if you can do a unit test for it too!

(In reply to Nick Burch from comment #1)
> Any chance you could write up a small patch to add this in? Bonus marks if
> you can do a unit test for it too!

I would like to provide small patches or enhancement in future once i get time to go through open XML format and code base. (esp. i would look into the feasibility of adding column chart from the scratch).
